title: Tibu
author: Tibu
content: Â»-(Â¯`Â·.Â·Â´Â¯)-> ----------Intro---------- <-(Â¯`Â·.Â·Â´Â¯)-Â«On January 3, 2009, a man named Satoshi Nakamoto launched Bitcoin BTC, the first-ever decentralized and trusted cryptocurrency. In 2011, he disappeared from circulation.The Satoshi Mystery is a documentary web series that deciphers the workings of the Bitcoin revolution while investigating the identity of its enigmatic creator, who has remained anonymous until now.You can freely watch this French documentary here : https://www.arte.tv/fr/videos/RC-021581/le-mystere-satoshi/Â»-(Â¯`Â·.Â·Â´Â¯)-> ----------Serie rating---------- <-(Â¯`Â·.Â·Â´Â¯)-Â«A lot of people recommand this webserie! Why!? Because this is by far the most well documented, designed and easy to understant serie about Satoshi Nakamoto and Bitcoin.Here are a few people speaking about "Le MystÃ¨re Satoshi":â­â­â­â­â­   Â»-(Â¯`Â·.Â·Â´Â¯)-> ----------Ultra limited merch---------- <-(Â¯`Â·.Â·Â´Â¯)-Â«ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ The Satoshi Mystery is a documentary series about Bitcoin and its pseudonymous creator Satoshi Nakamoto. It has been broadcasted by ARTE from the 17th of November 2021 and has gathered more than 3 million views in Europe across its different platforms in less than 2 months.-------------------------------Auction is done on Plebeian.marketâ¡ï¸https://plebeian.market/auctions/OOBQâ¡ï¸https://plebeian.market/auctions/QCTAâ¡ï¸https://plebeian.market/auctions/C2WQ------------------------------This auction is for:ğŸThe Satoshi Mystery poster number X/21ğŸThe Satoshi Mystery audiotape number X/21ğŸOne The Satoshi Mystery Satochip wallet.The poster and the Satochip wallet have been designed by the artist Victorien Aubineau, who has made the animation sequences of the series, and the music was composed and recorded by the musician GreÌgoire Terrier, who has made â€˜The Satoshi Mysteryâ€™ score. The digital master of these 10 minutes of exclusive music has been permanently erased by GreÌgoire Terrier: it is now exclusively on the 21 audiotapes that have been made. There will not be more than 21 posters and 21 audiotapes ever made and certified on the bitcoin blockchain through Verisart. There is an holographic sticker on each poster and one on each audiotape, with a unique QR code that links to its certificate of authenticity. On the posters, the sticker is on the bottom right; on the audiotapes, it is inside the box.Please note that the posters will not be sold framed, just rolled up. Print: Quadri / Paper: White, satin coated 200 g/m2, 60x80cm. +  +

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Awesome looking - would bid but for the LN wallets I use (strike, wallet of satoshi and bluewallet) they don't seem to work with plebian - all gave either authentication errors or errors with the lnurlGlws

comments.author: Remsjack
comments.body: Gosh I love that poster, thank you for this Tibu!Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on October 03, 2022, 10:39:25 AMAwesome looking - would bid but for the LN wallets I use (strike, wallet of satoshi and bluewallet) they don't seem to work with plebian - all gave either authentication errors or errors with the lnurlI use Bluewallet (iOS app) and it works well with Plebeian. I've also tested Fiatjaf's LNTXBOT (Telegram) and it's alright as well

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: This is what I get with blue wallet:

comments.author: Remsjack
comments.body: I have the same message when authenticating with BW, but afterwards Plebeian's website logs me in nonetheless, so I figured it was just a small bug. I use the 6.3.1 iOS app

comments.author: Tibu
comments.body: Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on October 03, 2022, 10:39:25 AMAwesome looking - would bid but for the LN wallets I use (strike, wallet of satoshi and bluewallet) they don't seem to work with plebian - all gave either authentication errors or errors with the lnurlGlwsWell... I got the same error using BlueWallet but - at the end - I got authenticated. I must admit pleabian.market is a bit buggy. Had to try several time to go through it and make a sucessful bid but at the end, it works.From time to time, I had to wait several seconds for page to load properly.

comments.author: Remi Forte
comments.body: Hello there !My name is RÃ©mi Forte and I am the director of The Satoshi Mystery documentary series. I have been on Bitcointalk for a while now (it is even featured in the series) but this is my first post.First of all, I would like to thank you, Tibu, for that post ! Thank you very much. It is awesome to share our Plebeian auctions here.Second, I am sad to read that Plebeian is not working that well. We wanted to try this platform which I think is pretty cool, but as I understand it it is only a few months old so it can not be perfect yet - even the lightning network is somewhat still an experiment (with a 5.000 btc capacity as of today though !). Given that the series is about Bitcoin, it made more sense for us (Victorien Aubineau who made the animation of The Satoshi Mystery, GrÃ©goire Terrier who composed the score, and myself) to make the auctions in Bitcoin, not in fiat, even if the options are quite limited and if there are a few bumps along the way.If you want to place a bid but are struggling to, send me a PM and I will bid for you or figure something out.As for The Satoshi Mystery customized Satochip wallets, we indeed only made 6 of them: the team (Victorien Aubineau, GrÃ©goire Terrier, and myself) kept 3, and the 3 others are on Plebeian right now.BUT, if everything is not sold on Plebeian, we will sell the remaining objects separately. I will let you know, Mopar, if you are interested.If you have got any question, please do not hesitate to ask meÂ  Thank you for your interest !

comments.author: cygan
comments.body: i would then also be interested in this limited wallet

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC

I have been on Bitcointalk for a while now (it is even featured in the series) but this is my first post.First of all, I would like to thank you, Tibu, for that post ! Thank you very much. We wanted to try this platform which I think is pretty cool, but as I understand it it is only a few months old so it can not be perfect yet - even the lightning network is somewhat still an experiment (with a 5.000 btc capacity as of today though !). Given that the series is about Bitcoin, it made more sense for us (Victorien Aubineau who made the animation of The Satoshi Mystery, GrÃ©goire Terrier who composed the score, and myself) to make the auctions in Bitcoin, not in fiat, even if the options are quite limited and if there are a few bumps along the way.If you want to place a bid but are struggling to, send me a PM and I will bid for you or figure something out.As for The Satoshi Mystery customized Satochip wallets, we indeed only made 6 of them: the team (Victorien Aubineau, GrÃ©goire Terrier, and myself) kept 3, and the 3 others are on Plebeian right now.BUT, if everything is not sold on Plebeian, we will sell the remaining objects separately. I will let you know, Mopar, if you are interested.If you have got any question, please do not hesitate to ask meÂ  Thank you for your interest !I am for sure - I love satochip wallets and have several different variations and always trying to find more.
